page.title: 15LIFESTYLE IN WOODLAND 1
page.content: Adult Female{skirts}are knee length. Pastel shades are popular with women. Men mostly wear casual{clothes. Most men have short{hair}but a few have long{hair.}The majority of women have curled{hair. If people from Woodland want to{eat {out}they have to leave the village.The most popular places are the Malt Shovel Inn and the Old Manor House. There are no Take-Aways in the area. Bingo is played in the{Village Hall. {The Edge}and{The Royal Public Houses each have a darts team and a domino team. { Younger People}see page 16.
